Articles.Content:
A few months ago, my KER display changed from normal to 

this. I have tried reinstalling and quicksaving, but nothing seems to work.

Its getting on my nerves now.

Furthermore, the KER engineer readouts are all in the same layout, and the VAB/SPH readouts are also badly compressed and displayed. None of the buttons display, much less work.

Any help?

Those settings are stored somewhere in the XML files in GameData/KerbalEngineer/Settings. I'm not saying you should necessarily delete them, but if you did delete them, the display should reset to the defaults.
